code: import'./App.css';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import RegisterForm from'./components/RegisterForm';import LoginForm from'./components/LoginForm';import HomePage from'./components/HomePage';import axios from'axios';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";axios.defaults.xsrfHeaderName='X-CSRFToken';axios.defaults.xsrfCookieName='csrftoken';function App(){const[isLoggedIn,setisLoggedIn]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{axios.post('user/isLoggedIn/').then(response=>{setisLoggedIn(response.data['authenticated']);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/register",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegisterForm,{})})]})})});}export default App;
